titleStmt.title: The life of John Baptist Colbert, late minister and secretary of state to Lewis XIV, the present French king done into English from a French copy printed at Cologne this present year, 1695.
Vie de Jean-Baptiste Colbert. English
titleStmt.author: Courtilz de Sandras, Gatien, 1644-1712.

notesStmt.note: First ed. of this translation of: La vie de Jean-Baptiste Colbert.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
